title: Brothers In Arms
description: Two years ago, Bobby Baines’ life lay in ruins. After losing his foster father, his superhero mentors, and his best friend, he turned his back on his “Scarlet Knight” alter ego in pursuit of education. Now back from school, back in town, and back in costume, Bobby’s attempts to get back to normal are disrupted by a teenager who insinuates himself into Bobby’s personal and professional lives. Is the former sidekick ready for a sidekick of his own?
author: Pab Sungenis
